TopicTitle: Shelley Space Program: Project Kerman (Stream @ 8 PM EST)

Articles.Content:
So, continuing from last Fridays stream I am finishing up the Kerman Project by building a basic space station. Of course since it's Friday night I will be tossing back a few and testing the effects of booze and rocketry. This is an entirely stock stream so if I can do it inebriated and live so can you! I've added a gallery below of some of the screen shots from the first episode in case people want to know what they missed. I hope you stop by and kick up your feet for a few minutes and watch this old drunk try and space. Listed below are the current missions for the program tonight.

Kerman Station I

Status: PLANNED

Launch Kerman Station Core to LKO (100 KM)

Kerman Station II

Status: PLANNED

Launch Kerman Station Hab to Rendezvous with Kerman Station Core (100 KM)
